DOC.brief_summary: To determine efficacy safety sildenafil citrate treatment establish pre-eclampsia
DOC.criteria: Subjects preeclampsia define new hypertension diastolic BP > = 90 mmHg two occasion separate least 4 hr arise 20 week pregnancy , associate > 500 mg/24 hr proteinuria . Subjects preexist hypertension ( treatment ) need fulfill proteinuria requirement . Gestational age 2434 w Singleton pregnancy Where urgent delivery indicate Where fetus suspect structural chromosomal abnormality
